decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan and Block Plan, Proposed Studio Room Plans and Elevations. Received 24/06/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The building hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling on this site and shall not be occupied as primary residential accommodation or as a separate dwelling or for business use.
description: Erection of a single storey detached garden room
